edu.cmu.sphinx.fst

Class ImmutableFst

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.fst.Fst
      • edu.cmu.sphinx.fst.ImmutableFst

  • public class ImmutableFst
extends Fst
    An immutable finite state transducer implementation. Holds a fixed size array of ImmutableState objects not allowing additions/deletions

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class edu.cmu.sphinx.fst.Fst
